name: The Silver Bracelets of Eternity <dark glow>
data: It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It decreases the users constitution pathetically.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It has average armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers a bit faster than avarage.
It gives tiny bonus to the spell 'magical storm'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'conceal spellcasting'.
